mutants.mutated_line: normalized = [x * total for x in data]
mutants.code:
def normalize_and_sort(data):
    data.sort()
    data = [x for x in data if x >= 0]
    total = sum(data)
    normalized = [x * total for x in data]
    normalized.sort(reverse=True)
    return normalized
